T02D3120:219b-0: @219b ` // rma bya chen mo sgrub thabs bzhugs /
T02D3120:219b-2: * // de bzhin du sngar bstan ba'i cho gas stong pa
T02D3120:219b-3: nyid kyi rjes la sna tshogs padma dang zla ba
T02D3120:219b-4: la / mam yig ljang gu yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D3120:219b-5: 'phags ma rma bya chen mo mdog ljang gu / zhal gsum pa /
T02D3120:219b-7: zhal so so la spyan gsum pa ste /
T02D3120:219b-8: zhal g-yas dang g-yon sngon po dang dkar po'o //
T02D3120:219b-9: g-yas kyi phyag gsum la go rims bzhin du rma bya'i mjug sgro dang /
T02D3120:219b-11: phyag g-yon pa gsum na rin po che'i snye ma dang /
T02D3120:219b-13: phang par gnas pa'i bum pa'o //
T02D3120:219b-14: sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang sham thabs can /
T02D3120:219b-15: sgeg pa lang tsho la bab pa'i cha lugs can /
T02D3120:219b-16: zla ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i gdan can /
T02D3120:219b-18: don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan can du skad cig gis bskyed la /
T02D3120:219b-22: lte ba rnams su zla ba la go rims ji lta bar /
T02D3120:219b-23: aom a'a: mam h'um zhes pa'i yi ge bsams te spro ba dang bsdu ba bya'o //
T02D3120:219b-24: de nas ngal na sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02D3120:219b-25: aom ma h'a m'a y'u ri bidy'a r'a dzny'i h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
